name: proxy-switch
description: Interactive CLI to switch system-wide proxy settings on Ubuntu

scripts.sea-inject: cp $(which node) dist/bin/proxy-switch && npx postject dist/bin/proxy-switch NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.package: pnpm build && pnpm bundle && pnpm sea-prep && pnpm sea-inject

author: Navid Shirmohammadi
